sections.heading: False pack or labeling; reuse of containers3-462
sections.text: False pack or labeling; reuse of containersA. No container of citrus fruit shall bear grade or other designations that are false or misleading, nor shall it contain any deceptive pack, deceptive arrangement or deceptive display.B. Subsection A shall b
